thread.title: Kompany, Toure and Manchester City stars race roosters for Chinese New Year
thread.title_full: Kompany, Toure and Manchester City stars race roosters for Chinese New Year

author: Chris Wright
title: Kompany, Toure and Manchester City stars race roosters for Chinese New Year
text:
56 minutes ago Kompany, Toure and Manchester City stars race roosters for Chinese New Year 
To celebrate the upcoming Chinese New Year later this month, Manchester City had several of their players race roosters in a pen outside their stadium. 
Yep. You read that correctly. Who rules the roost at City? Find out as #chinesenewyear lands at #mcfc ! - Manchester City (@ManCity) 23 January 2017 
The likes of Vincent Kompany, Yaya Toure, Leroy Sane, Fernandinho and Pablo Zabaleta all separated off into teams and happily raced chickens for the afternoon, with several of the City stars even giving full pre and post-race interviews. 
We can assure you that while no roosters were harmed in the making of this video, several professional sporting reputations were destroyed beyond repair! 
Chris covers the funny side of the game for ESPN FC in the Toe Poke blog.
